Sentencas: Proton -conducting barium zirconate perovskite attracts considerable attention as an electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To obtain BaZrO 3 -based electrolytes with high ionic conductivity at low temperatures, composite electrolytes named BaZrO 3 +x wt% NaOH are designed and synthesized.
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A study is conducted to explore the effects of molten -state NaOH and a small amount of Na 2 CO 3 generated during SOFC operation on the performance of composite electrolytes systematically.
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a result of the addition of NaOH, the composite electrolyte is created with rich surfaces and solid -liquid interfaces, compared to traditional condensed electrolytes.
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The solid -liquid interface can serve as a high-speed ion conduction channel.
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In -situ surface oxygen deficiency induced by NaOH and the bridge function of carbonate enable rapid ion migration along the interface of the composite electrolyte.
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fuel cell with the prepared electrolyte can deliver an excellent maximum power density (MPD) of 1039 mW cm -2 at 550 degrees C.
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 350 degrees C, the cells are also able to show a very impressive power density of 365 mW cm -2 .
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The concise design, convenient preparation process, and outstanding performance of the fuel cell collectively offer an effective strategy for advancing the manufacture of electrolyte materials for low - temperature operation.
Titulo: Highly functional molten sodium hydroxide-BaZrO3 composite electrolyte with hybrid ionic conductivity for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
